story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Looker and the other International Police are
gonna mark Volo.
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
At this rate, they might uncover his plans to
get his hands on Arceus.
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
It’ll be hard to keep that a secret much
longer.
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Volo was definitely in contact with
Team Rocket.
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
If he’s starting to make big moves, this could
be your chance to change his mind, Rei.
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: Rei, I won’t let this opportunity escape me.
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
This time, I’ll be the victor! I’ll wield the
power of Arceus!
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I was hoping to brainstorm more solutions,
but it seems we won’t have time.
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Thanks for telling me right away, Paulo.
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
(What’s he trying to do, getting in touch
with Team Rocket?)
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_1600_10: Paulo... Could I ask you one last favor?
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: Sure, I’ll help however I can.
story_arceus_06_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: Would you mind coming with me...
